quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
quotes.quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.

quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
quotes.quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.

quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
quotes.quote: Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.

quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.quote: The only thing worse than being blind is having sight but no vision.

quotes.author: Mark Twain
quotes.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.

quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
quotes.quote: Experience is simply the name we give our mistakes.

quotes.author: Socrates
quotes.quote: True wisdom comes to each of us when we realize how little we understand about life, ourselves, and the world around us.

quotes.author: Winston Churchill
quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller
quotes.quote: What great thing would you attempt if you knew you could not fail?

quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison
quotes.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.

quotes.author: Tony Robbins
quotes.quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.

quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe
quotes.quote: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.

quotes.author: Pablo Picasso
quotes.quote: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once we grow up.

quotes.author: Elon Musk
quotes.quote: Some people don't like change, but you need to embrace change if the alternative is disaster.

quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.
quotes.quote: I have a dream that one day this nation will rise up and live out the true meaning of its creed: 'We hold these truths to be self-evident, that all men are created equal.'

quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes.quote: Life is a journey, not a destination.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: By three methods we may learn wisdom: First, by reflection, which is noblest; Second, by imitation, which is easiest; and third by experience, which is the bitterest.

quotes.author: Lao Tzu
quotes.quote: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom. Mastering others is strength; mastering yourself is true power.

quotes.author: Nelson Mandela
quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

quotes.author: Maya Angelou
quotes.quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.

quotes.author: Michael Jordan
quotes.quote: I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying.
I'm not lazy, I'm just on my energy-saving mode.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: There are only 10 types of people in the world: those who understand binary, and those who don't.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: I told my wife she should embrace her mistakes. She gave me a hug.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith is not the belief that God will do what you want. It is the belief that God will do what is right.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Honesty is the best policy. If I lose mine honor, I lose myself.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I'm not lazy, I'm just on my energy-saving mode.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs.
quotes.author: Unknown
